delete.content: Note: if you want to use a mapping on a different page, it is advised to reassign it instead of deleting it.
delete.headline: Are you sure you want to delete the following Default Mapping?
delete.headline_plural: Are you sure you want to delete the following Default Mappings?
delete.terms: I understand that this cannot be undone
delete.title: Delete Default Mapping

infoButton.moveAction: Mapping to this page will be removed when {{pagePath}} is published
infoButton.notPublished: Several mappings will be set as default until publication of {{pagePath}}

move.confirm: I understand that this action cannot be undone
move.content: Please select a page or enter a path directly
move.title: Move Mapping

publish.content: Are you sure you want to publish the selected vanity URL(s)? Publication will be started as a background job.
publish.title: Confirm Publication

publishdeletion.content: It is not possible to delete Live Mappings individually, so please note that all of the listed Live Mappings will be deleted.
publishdeletion.headline: You are about to delete the following Live Mapping URL
publishdeletion.headline_plural: You are about to delete multiple Live Mapping URLs
publishdeletion.title: Delete Live Mappings

errors.InvalidMappingError_message: The vanity URL may only contain letters, digits, dots, dashes and no consecutive slashes
errors.MoveSiteError: Mappings cannot be assigned to different sites

notifications.newMappingCreatedAndPublished: New mapping(s) added, publication job started in background
notifications.publicationDeletionConfirmed: Deleted. Publication job started in background
